    • countDone

      public int countDone​(java.util.LinkedList<Task> listOfTasks)
      Returns the the number of task "done"

    • processCommand

      public boolean processCommand()
      Process a command from main menu by scanning user's input
      Returns:
      askedToQuit=true if user selected quit

    • printDisplayTaskMenu

      public void printDisplayTaskMenu​(int depth)
      Display all tasks display sorting menu, process sorting by title,project or due date.
      Parameters:
      depth - : limit of number of recursions allowed. (recursive method)

    • sortBy

      public java.util.LinkedList<Task> sortBy​(char mode)
      Sort the task by selected mode
      Parameters:
      mode - : the mode selected ('d':due date , 'p':project , 's':status )

    • sortedListToString

      public void sortedListToString​(java.util.LinkedList<Task> list, char mode)
      Prints the correct data corresponding to the sorted mode selected
      Parameters:
      list - : the sorted list to print
      mode - : the mode selected ('d':due date , 'p':project , 's':status )

    • addNewTaskGatherer

      public java.lang.String[] addNewTaskGatherer()
      Get user input for adding a new task
      Returns:
      an array with user input data

    • addNewTask

      public void addNewTask​(java.lang.String[] newData)
      Add a new task to the list. boolean isDone is set to false by default when a task is added
      Parameters:
      newData - : array returned by addNewTaskGatherer() method.

    • editTask

      public void editTask​(int depth)
      Display all tasks , display edit menu, process action requested ( update(), markAsDone() , remove() )
      Parameters:
      depth - : limit of number of recursions allowed. (recursive method)

    • markAsDone

      public void markAsDone​(int index)
      Marks as done the task at the index passed
      Parameters:
      index - : the index of the task to be proceed

    • updatePrintDisplaySentence

      public void updatePrintDisplaySentence​(int index, char mode)
      Help function that display adapted menu for updateGatherer(int index)
      Parameters:
      index - the same index
      mode - 't': title , 'p': project , 'd': due date

    • updateGatherer

      public java.lang.String[] updateGatherer​(int index)
      Gather user choice for updating a task
      Parameters:
      index - the index chosen which will be modified
      Returns:
      an array with all the info , null if non modified

    • update

      public void update​(int index, java.lang.String[] newData)
      Update a task by replacing the fields through Task class setters.
      Parameters:
      index - the index chosen which will be modified
      newData - an String array returned by updateGatherer(int index) methods that collects user input. If an empty String is received, data is not updated.

    • removeTask

      public void removeTask​(int index)

    • saveToFile

      public void saveToFile()
      save to file taskFile.txt (path:./src/main/resources/taskFile.txt ) using serialization

    • loadFromFile

      public void loadFromFile()
      load from file taskFile.txt (path:./src/main/resources/taskFile.txt ) using serialization

    • quit

      public void quit()
      exits the program
